about_the_game:
Tower of Origin 2- Worm's nest R18 DLC. This includes drawing, CG, script and sound.

It has the same content as Mega . No need to manually download patches now. It can also update automatically.

The patch link of Mega will still be retained, and the patch can be downloaded independently according to different network environment.

Hope to facilitate your game.

content_descriptors.notes: This is THE R18 DLC ,it content, including nudity, forced sex, group sex and other adult content.

detailed_description:
Tower of Origin 2- Worm's nest R18 DLC. This includes drawing, CG, script and sound.

It has the same content as Mega . No need to manually download patches now. It can also update automatically.

The patch link of Mega will still be retained, and the patch can be downloaded independently according to different network environment.

Hope to facilitate your game.
name: Tower Of Origin2-Worm's Nest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: penGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: Tower of Origin 2- Worm's nest R18 DLC. This includes drawing, CG, script and sound. It has the same content as Mega . No need to manually download patches now. It can also update automatically.
